content.title: Social Media and Community Updates
content.creator:
Mango Audio
February 24, 2025
content.content:
Hello Everyone!!
We have recently made our social media account and community through Instagram and Discord server for any kind of updates and supports we can provide. Anyone is welcomed to join the community!

We wanted to share and see if anyone would be open to sharing or supporting our project—whether on your social media, with your friends, or in any other way you see fit. Your support would mean a lot and could help this project to reach more people who appreciate high-quality audio engineering.

This project represents years of research and development. We’d love any support you can offer, whether it's spreading the word or even just checking out our social media.

Please join and follow!!!
Discord Community Server: https://discord.gg/7QynYMmPbU
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mango_audio/
Gmail: mangoaudiolab@gmail.com
Thank you.
Mango Audio

content.title: New Demo Video Came Out!!!
content.creator:
Mango Audio
February 12, 2025
content.content:
Enjoy the new sound demonstration video of our Mango Audio speaker. Please check it out and, if you can share and support, it would be really appreciated.
Thank you.
Mango Audio
